name: Run Chicken, Run
description:
Can you help the chicken get to the other side?
Play this fun endless runner and see how far you can go!
Stay alive, avoid obstacles, and collect coins!

With single player and multiplayer modes. The fun continues with multiplayer mode: Play against your friends using Game Center!

FEATURES:
- Single swipe controls that are easy to use
- Great looking interface and fantastic animations
- Play as 50 different characters!
- Multiplayer mode: play against your friends
- Game Center scoreboard
- Universal app: for all your iOS devices!
